Name: KILL YOUR FRIENDS
About the game: KILL YOUR FRIENDS is a multiplayer online arena shooter for up to 6 players. Kill your friends, or strangers, or AI using a variety of guns & explosives! Collect coins to add to your stash - the player with the most coins at the end of the match wins!
